column10: Operating system (Linux), CPU Architecture (x86), Average duration (1 hours), Number of tasks or pods (2 per day), Amount of ephemeral storage allocated for Amazon ECS (20 GB), Amount of memory allocated (2 GB)
Number of vCPUs per Node (for all Nodes in shard) (2), Quantity (2), Server utilization (180 Hours/Month), Instance type (db.t4g.medium)
Number of secrets (1), Average duration of each secret (30 days), Number of API calls (1 per month)

column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
